text.textblock: The Plumas National Forest is no longer involved in the preparation of an Environmental Impact Statement for the Saddle Timber Sale.
The notice of Intent, published in the
on February 3, 1989, is hereby rescinded (54 FR 9194).

doctitle.textblock: Saddle Timber Sale, Plumas National Forest; Environmental Impact Statement Cancellation

further.textblock: R.C. Bennett, Environmental Coordinator, Plumas National Forest, Box 11500, Quincy, CA 95971, telephone (916) 283-2050.
